node.title: kunzpolyhedron
node.description: A SageMath package for working with Kunz posets.
node.associatedPaper: Numerical semigroups, polyhedra, and posets II, and III

node.title: lattice_plot
node.description: Python scripts for building Weyl alternation diagrams for Lie algebras of type D₂, B₂, C₂, and G₂.
node.associatedPaper: Visualizing the support of Kostant's weight multiplicity formula for the rank two Lie algebras

node.title: MatrixManipulator
node.description: A web application to perform row operations on matrices representing free resolutions.

node.title: weyldiagrams
node.description: A web application to build the Weyl alternation diagrams from the lattice_plot project.
node.associatedPaper: Visualizing the support of Kostant's weight multiplicity formula for the rank two Lie algebras
